TopicTitle: Please nominate KSP for steam award and post your nomination

Articles.Content:
I think everyone agree KSP  can use a steam award.

http://store.steampowered.com/SteamAwardNominations

While "test of time" and "5 more minutes", and “I Thought This Game Was Cool Before It Won An Award”, we can only pick one.

I am creating a poll to see what everyone voted, so we do not split the vote and lose nomination. Rocket League is really strong.

Edit: while you may not be able to change the results here, you can do so on steam. And you can nominate on steam as long as you have an account, I think?

EDIT2:I myself gone with Test of time.

Edited November 25, 2016 by Jestersage
Missing the option "neither since not on steam"
Test of Time obviously fits best, the game is from 2011, and as far as I see, a lot of people still play and come back to it at times (me being the latter, I have nothing to do in there).

8 hours ago, HoloYolo said:

Test of Time obviously fits best, the game is from 2011, and as far as I see, a lot of people still play and come back to it at times (me being the latter, I have nothing to do in there).

Exactly what I thought. Especially since it was already ace and has just gotten better.

Some folks are going for "5 more minutes" but I already nominated something else for that.

"Test of time" I think is a little more prestigious anyway.
